comments.body: The existing  [test ](https://github.com/douglasiacovelli/flutter/blob/bd4043077de1a7f437778d45076ddf00d941f25b/packages/flutter/test/widgets/router_test.dart#L777) case will trigger `didUpdateWidget` and `didChangeDependencies`(`_RouterScope` InheritedWidget change) at the same time, so no bug will be triggered.
